title: Help me ! please
body: This is messed up, I could not get into a game because my client keeps crashing and when I tried again. my team remade .. which is fine, but when I received a 20 min wait time for something which I could not avoid it makes me frustrated. So Riot Please remove this wait Time thank you. Also I am receiving an error saying about I lost connection to the servers, which is strange.

replies.body: Try running your client as administrator and make sure any firewalls are set to not interrupt league. If it still continues, uninstall the game and remove any excess files that still are in your folders (relating to league). If it still continues, submit a ticket to riot

Your account can receive an escalated lower priority queue if it continues to be marked by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  The only way to remove it is by completing the required games without further interruptions.  I'd be happy to help with whatever is causing you to leave these games, and get you back in the game.  Just let me know!

Thing is, I did not leave on purpose, My client crashed something which i could not avoid, plus it says that my connection to the server failed, try and reconnect, I tried over 20 times, no lie ... And is there anyway to fix this problem? Your help would be greatly appreciated

Thanks for the follow up!  Even if it was not on purpose, leaving games still causes everyone else a negative experience because they were down a player.  

We can absolutely work on getting this fixed!  It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a connection to our servers, and kicking you out.  As a first step, go over the instructions in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  This should resolve the issue, but let me know if you have come up with any questions or error messages!

It's best to troubleshoot in a custom game to prevent any further ranked issues.  Reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we'll dig deeper.  Also gather a set of logs from our[ hextech repair tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)and attach it to your ticket.  We'll help out with your issue individually and respond to the ticket as soon as possible.
